Body:
"""
        Test that the right errors are raised when invalid symmetric decryption
        algorithms are used.
        """
engine = crypto.CryptographyEngine()
args = None, b'', b''
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    'Decryption algorithm is required.', engine.decrypt, *args)
args = 'invalid', b'', b''
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    "Decryption algorithm 'invalid' is not a supported symmetric decryption algorithm."
    , engine.decrypt, *args)
